se.opendataexchange.ethernetip4j
Class EthernetIpBufferUtil

java.lang.Object
  se.opendataexchange.ethernetip4j.EthernetIpBufferUtil

public class EthernetIpBufferUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A Wrapper around a ByteBuffer. Provides methods to get/put the primitive types of the PLC system: USINT 1 byte (unsigned small integer) UINT 2 byte (unsigned integer) INT 2 byte (integer) REAL 4 byte (floating point value) UDINT 4 byte (unsigned double integer) DINT 4 byte (double integer) LINT 8 byte (long integer) This buffer puts/gets the bytes according to the LITTLE_ENDIAN format.
